form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Under Docket Control at Los Angeles, Immigration and Naturalization Service

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/6/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 300 NORTH LOS ANCELES STREET LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90012 File No.: A17210822 Date: Dec 28, 1967 CYRS Esther MEyeR 136 So Palm Drive Beverly Hills, Caly 90212 5/21/70 6/5/69 RD cert to Japan 6/5/71 UNDER James DOCKET CONTROL AT LOS PLEASE NOTE THE DECISION INDICATED BELOW WHICH HAS BEEN MADE ON YOUR APPLICATION: Was,1968 Feg Smart bring renewal Pargetty date letter for Upon for extension of consideration, it is ordered that your application temporary stay be DENIED for your the reason checked below. It will be necessary for you to depart from the United States not later Loo/DE than July 5, 1968 . . You must notify this office before that date of the arrangements you have made to effect your departure, including the date, place and manner of departure. At the time of your departure, do not fail to surrender Form I-94, Arrival-Departure Record, in accordance with In- structions on that form. 5-27-71 R/OEXT.TO JUNE 5,1972 205/Das duting You have failed to establish that you intend to depart from the United States within a definite time. You have failed to establish that you have a residence abroad to which you intend to return. You have failed to establish that you can financially maintain yourself as a bona fide nonimmi- grant. You have failed to establish that the purpose for which you were admitted has not been accom- plished and that your requested extension is not merely an attempt to prolong your stay indefi- nitely. You have violated your nonimmigrant status by accepting unauthorized employment in the United States. Upon consideration, it is ordered that your application as a nonimmigrant student for permission to accept or continue employment be denied for the following reasons: Enclosures: Form I-94 Your Passport UNDER DOCKET CONTROL AT LOS Very truly yours of Form I-541 (Rev. 7-4-67) DISTRICT DIRECTOR
